thread.title: Lady Gaga prepared for her Super Bowl halftime in a pink football uniform... and no pants
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga prepared for her Super Bowl halftime in a pink football uniform... and no pants

author: Peter Allen Clark
title: Lady Gaga prepared for her Super Bowl halftime in a pink football uniform... and no pants
text:
Lady Gaga got ready for her Super Bowl 2017 halftime show the only way she knows how ‚Äî with some real fashion flair.
As the players took the field, Gaga posted an Insta of her warming up, though her warm up outfit did not include pants. Instead, she opted for a pink, personalized helmet and jersey.
SEE ALSO: Superb Owl 51 is swooping in to save your weekend
It was all she needed.
Warming up ü§òüé§üèà
A photo posted by xoxo, Joanne (@ladygaga) on Feb 5, 2017 at 3:07pm PST
Gaga has said that she's ready to get political this Sunday, and, while doing so, she will apparently be surrounded by drones .
It really doesn't seem like any of that requires pants.
